2227032119.resolved_title: Optimizing your Solidity contract’s gas usage
2227032119.excerpt: As everyone in the Ethereum community knows, Gas is a necessary evil for the execution of smart contracts. If you specify too little, your transaction may not get picked up for processing in a timely manner — or, die in the middle of processing a smart contract action.
